item.title: Return Oriented Programming
item.description:
Return-Oriented Programming (ROP) â€“ A Beginner’s Journey

So recently, I finally took the dive into Return-Oriented Programming (ROP) and wanted to document my experience. Not just for anyone else learning, but also for future me when I inevitably forget how I did this in a week.

This post is based on a simple binary exploitation flow, and I followed along with the John Hammond Misfortune CTF ROP video. Highly recommend checking that out if you’re just getting into this.

ğŸš€ Why I Built This Site

To document and reflect on my learning, give back to the community, and stay sharp by sharing knowledge publicly. Cybersecurity is a fast-evolving field, and I believe in learning by doing â€” and teaching.
